67402.「では タロットに 運命をたずねてみましょう。\n 心をしずめて ゆっくりと\n:
Let's ask the Tarot about your fate. Please
take a moment to calm your mind, and
then draw a card...

67474.「ここで お会いしたのも 何かのご縁。\n 出会えた幸運を祝して あなたの\n:
It must've been fate that we met here. To
celebrate this meeting, I would like to tell
your fortune.
<select>
Draw without thinking.
Draw with a calm mind.
Draw passionately!
Cancel
<select_end>
<case 1>
<break>
<case 2>
<break>
<case 3>
<break>
<case 4>
<break>
<case_cancel>
<break>
<case_end>

67798.「占いは 出会いのたびに 一度だけ\n 行うものです。次に出会えたときに\n ま:
I can only tell your fortune once per
encounter. The next time we meet, I can
tell your fortune again.
<bw_break>

67799.「さて……占いは 終了です。\n タロットの示した運命が これから先の\n あな:
Well... The reading is over. I hope the fate
of the Tarot will help you on your journey...<bw_break>

67800.「私は まだもうしばらく この魔法の迷宮で \n 次の運命を 待とうと思います。:
I think I'll stay in this magical labyrinth
for a while longer, waiting for my next
destiny. And I hope to see you again.<turn_end>

71215.「あなたの運命を示すカードの裏に\n もう１枚 カードが隠れていました。\n こ:
Behind the card that shows your destiny, there is another card hidden... This is the... The Wheel of Fortune. The Tarot must
be guiding you here. This card is for you.

71804.「まあ……。どうやら かばんが\n いっぱいのようですね。\n<br>\n「特別:
Well... Looks like your bag is full... I may
be able to give you a special card, so please
empty your bags and talk to me again...<turn_end>

72400.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コインと同じように 悪霊の神々:
By offering this card to the statue in the magical labyrinth, you can fight the demonic gods the same way you would a coin... But it
expires in <%nL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today... Unlike coins, the Wheel of Fortune cards cannot be given to others. You must
fight it yourself, for it is truly your destiny. And remember, once the card expires, it's useless. Please be careful...

72401.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コインと同じように アトラスと:
By offering this card to the statue in the Labyrinth of Magic, you can fight Atlas just as you would any coin. But it expires in
<%nL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today... Unlike the coins, the Wheel of Fortune cards cannot be given to others. You must fight it
yourself, for it is truly your destiny. And remember, once the card expires, it's useless. Please be careful...

72402.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コインと同じように バズズと戦:
By offering this card to the statue in the magical labyrinth, you can fight Bazuzu the same way you would a coin... But it expires
in <%nL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today... Unlike coins, the Wheel of Fortune cards cannot be given to others... You must fight it
yourself, for it is truly your destiny. And remember, once the card expires, it's useless. Please be careful...

72403.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コインと同じように ベリアルと:
By offering this card to the statue in the Magical Labyrinth, you can fight Belial the same way you would a coin... But it expires
in <%nL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today... Unlike coins, the Wheel of Fortune cards can't be given to others. You must fight it yourself,
for it is truly your destiny. And remember, once the card expires, it's useless. Please be careful...

72404.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コインのように ドラゴンガイア:
By offering this card to the statue in the magical labyrinth, you can fight Dragon Gaia like a coin... But it expires in
<%nL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today... Unlike coins, the Wheel of Fortune cards cannot be given to others... You must fight it
yourself, for it is truly your destiny. And remember, once the card expires, it's useless. Please be careful...

72406.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間の間:
This card indicates that you are destined to
be excited when your companion dies for
<%nL_KOUKA_TIME> hours from now...<bw_break>

72407.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間の間:
This card indicates that you're destined to add the occasional bit of horse manure to the treasure chests your enemies drop for the
next <%nL_KOUKA_TIME> hours.

72408.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間の間:
This card indicates that you're destined to
gain double experience in battle for the next
<%nL_KOUKA_TIME> hours...<bw_break>

72409.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間の間:
This card indicates that you have a 50%
chance of surviving with 1 HP in the event of
death for <%nL_KOUKA_TIME> hours from now...<bw_break>

72410.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間の間:
This card indicates that you are destined to be in high spirits at the start of battle for <%nL_KOUKA_TIME> hours from now, and only at
night.

72411.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間の間:
This card indicates that you are destined to
double the gold you earn in battle for the
next <%nL_KOUKA_TIME> hours...<bw_break>

72412.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間 バ:

chance of being bionized at the start of a

72413.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間の間:
This card indicates that you are destined to be excited at the start of battle for <%nL_KOUKA_TIME> hours from now, only during

72418.占いをした日から\n<%dL_KOUKA_TIME>日間 効果が持続します。\n:
The effect lasts for <%dL_KOUKA_TIME> days
from the date of divination... Time spent
logged out is not included...
